channel.title: moving on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in moving on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Another Move
item.description: A few more week we will move from our current address; this time within Bangalore. So compared to last moves it is going to be a very small one. In 2003, we crossedÂ Atlantic (California to Paris), in 2006 we crossed Indian ocean (Paris to Mumbai) and in 2008 we moved within India (Mumbai to Bangalore). Now this is just 20 Km move within Bangalore city. The painters from Asian Paint Home Solutions are doing the paint job and they are supposed to finish by 25th November.
